Translations.Text: Sihamtara ase-pase ghuraiphuraiba cira kisorasakale
prabahita nijaraara suraapurna panapatra arau piyalabora lai
se'i suraa pana karaile te'omlokara mura nughuraaya arau te'omloka jnanaharaa'o naha’ba
arau (ghuraiphuraiba) te'omlokara pachandaniya phala-mula lai
arau te'omlokara rauci anuyayi caraa'ira mansa lai
Arau te'omlokara babe thakiba mrganayani (danara cakubisista) hura
yeniba sihamta suraksita mukutahe
sihamte yi amala karaichila tara puraskarasbaraupa
Tata sihamte kono alagatiyala katha arau kono papabakya sunibalai napaba
suniba kerala chalama arau chalama
Arau somphalara dala; kimana ye bhagyabana somphalara dalato
Te'omloke thakiba ene udyanata, ya’ta ache kamitabihina bagarai gacha
arau thokerae bharaa kala gacha
arau samprasaraita cham
arau sadaya prabahamana pani
arau pracura phala-mula
yibora sesa naha'ba arau nisid'dha'o naha’ba
Arau (sihamta thakiba) su'ucca sayyasamuhata
niscaya ami sihamtaka (hurasakalaka) srsti karaicho bisesaraupata
tara pichata sihamtaka kumarai bana'icho
nija sbamira prati asakta arau samabayasiya
somphalara lokasakalara babe
Sihamtara bechibhage'i ha'ba purbarartilokasalara majara paraa
arau bahusankhyaka ha'ba parabartisakalara majara paraa
Arau ba'omphalara dala, kimana ye durbhagiya ba'omphalara dalato
sihamta thakiba atyanta usna bayu arau uttapta utala panita
arau ati ka'la dhomraara chamta
yito sitalo nahaya arau araamadayako nahaya
Niscaya sihamta itipurbe bhoga-bilasata magna achila
arau sihamta abiraama lipta achila jaghan'ya papa kamata
Arau sihamte kaichila, ‘ami yetiya marai mati arau harata parainata hama tetiya'o amaka punaraut'thita karaa ha’bane’
arau amara pitrpurausasakalako (uthoraa ha’bane)
koraa, ‘niscaya purbarartisakalako arau parabartisakalako
sakaloke ekatraita karaa ha’ba eta nirdharaita dinara nirdista samayata’
